channel.title: Proxmark3 on Sage's Succurity Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Proxmark3 on Sage's Succurity Blog

item.title: Intro to RFID Hacking
item.description: This primer is for those that are interested in RFID pentesting. If you don’t know where to start or if you are looking into RFID “hacking”, I hope you can take something away from all of this. I am in no way an expert and I am still learning as much as I can about this technology.
